title: New: HOWLINGS – Rest In Peace (R.I.P.)
content:
Another new cut from San Francisco‘s HOWLINGS.

Glisteningly sombre and spatially aware, Rest In Peace (R.I.P.) is at times overbearingly simple in its trap heavy skin, yet its lush and light handed vocal arrangements are striking and engrossing in equal measure.

RIP is taken from HOWLINGS’ CUTTHROAT” EP, release tba.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d24
